thread.title: Nicola McLean gets new wedding ring from husband Tom Williams for Valentine's Day as couple enjoy date night
thread.title_full: Nicola McLean gets new wedding ring from husband Tom Williams for Valentine's Day as couple enjoy date night

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Nicola McLean gets new wedding ring from husband Tom Williams for Valentine's Day as couple enjoy date night
text:
Showbiz Nicola McLean gets new wedding ring from husband Tom Williams for Valentine's Day as couple enjoy date night The star's romance survived her time in the Celebrity Big Brother house - and now they're stronger than ever Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Nicola McLean's relationship looks to be in a better position than ever following her time in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
The star has refused to wear her original wedding and engagement rings after her man's previous infidelity, but now that appears to be in the past as he brought her a new diamond for Valentine's Day. 
Perhaps symbolising a fresh start for the couple - who seem to be back on track after a rocky period - the pink rock was given to her on Monday evening as they enjoyed a date night. Nicola is delighted with her Valentine's Day gift (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) The couple look to be back on track (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
Nicola stunned on their romantic evening out as she stepped out in a green skirt and crop top ensemble. 
She put her toned midriff on display in the outfit, and flashed a lot of leg with a very high split. She showed off the diamond on Instagram (Photo: Instagram/nicolamclean) 
Nicola is clearly delighted with the brand new ring, and she took the chance to share the surprise with her fans on Instagram. 
She posted a snap holding up a glass of bubbly with the diamond on show, and admitted she loves the band. 
"Have to say a huge thank you to @sparklingjewellery for making this ring for Tom to surprise me with," she wrote. 
"I liked my costume version of it but I love my real one even more" Like us on Facebook
